name: Dortmund
fun_fact: Fun fact: Dortmund produces more beer than any other German city - it has 8 breweries producing over 6 million hectoliters annually, and the city once had over 100 breweries making it the beer capital of Germany!

hero_dishes.name: Pfefferpotthast
hero_dishes.description: Peppered beef stew with onions, cloves, and bay leaves - Dortmund's signature dish
hero_dishes.origin_story: A medieval dish from Westphalia - 'potthast' means pot roast. The pepper was once a luxury spice
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Zum Alten Markt, Pfefferkorn, traditional Westphalian restaurants

hero_dishes.name: WestfÃ¤lischer Pickert
hero_dishes.description: Thick potato pancake made with yeast, sometimes with raisins
hero_dishes.origin_story: Westphalian specialty - thicker and yeastier than regular potato pancakes
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Traditional restaurants, especially at Christmas markets

hero_dishes.name: Pumpernickel
hero_dishes.description: Dense, dark rye bread baked for 16-24 hours - Westphalia's famous export
hero_dishes.origin_story: The name allegedly comes from Napoleon's horse 'Nickel' - 'good for Nickel'. Westphalia has made it for centuries
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Bakeries throughout Dortmund, specialty bread shops

hero_dishes.name: Currywurst and Pommes
hero_dishes.description: Dortmund's take on the German classic, often from imbiss stands near the stadium
hero_dishes.origin_story: Essential football food - Signal Iduna Park (BVB stadium) is one of Europe's largest
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Imbiss stands near Signal Iduna Park, especially on match days

signature_drinks.name: Dortmunder Export
signature_drinks.description: Pale lager that's the city's signature beer style - less hoppy than Pilsner
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: From breweries like DAB, Kronen, Stifts - the Export style was invented here

signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Quick small beers to taste different varieties

food_culture_notes: BVB (Borussia Dortmund) football culture dominates - 81,000 capacity stadium
Industrial heritage reflected in hearty workers' food
Christmas market is one of Germany's largest
Brewery tours are major tourist attraction
